name: Rekindle
description:
Rekindle is a 3D third— person puzzle game where you need to explore the world in an interesting adventure. Experience the astonishing puzzle&narrative in the world of Rekindle！

Features

  • Single player
  • More than 4 hours game experience
  • Over 50 puzzle levels with unique mechanics.
  • Fun and stylized art
  • Many interesting narrative elements.

Rekindle was created by a team of 10 students in the Entertainment Arts and Engineering (EAE) Graduate Program at the University of Utah over the course of 3 months.
